summary: This mod simply replaces the jump animations.
descriptionHtml:
[color=red][b]
This is compatible with Skyrim v1.6 update, I think.
If anyone find a bug of my mod, please report at forum. ;)
[/b][/color]
======================================================================
YY Anim Replacer - Natural Jump
							[color=#00ffff][b]v1.0.0[/b][/color]
							2012-6-10
======================================================================
This mod simply replaces the jump animations.
[color=yellow]<Concept>
Not exaggerated, lore-friendly animation. Giving an option for \"bowlegged jump animation fix\" user.
If you are looking for a fancy jump, this is not what you want.
[/color]
[youtube]30lq_WYgljg[/youtube]
======================================================================
Installation
======================================================================
NMM ready package

<NMM-user>
Press \"download with NMM\" button to download, and then activate the mod on NMM.

<Non NMM-user> (Manual install)
Click \"download manually\" link to download, extract the 7z file,
go to \"\\meshes\\actors\\character\\animations\" directory, copy all hkx files
into \"skyrim\\Data\\meshes\\actors\\character\\animations\".


======================================================================
Uninstallation
======================================================================
<NMM-user>
Deactivate the mod on NMM.

<Non NMM-user> (Manual uninstall)
Delete the files as follows:
data\\meshes\\actors\\character\\animations\\
	mt_jump.HkX
	mt_jumpfall.HkX
	mt_jumpfallleft.HkX
	mt_jumpfallright.HkX
	mt_jumpfast.HkX
	mt_jumpfastleft.HkX
	mt_jumpfastright.HkX
	mt_jumpland.HkX
	mt_jumplandleft.HkX
	mt_jumplandright.HkX
	mt_jumpleft.HkX
	mt_jumpright.HkX


======================================================================
Known Issues
======================================================================
If you find, please report it to me at the forum or PM.


======================================================================

*Added skirt animations for all files

+Added	mt_jump.HkX

+Added	mt_jumpright.HkX
+Added	mt_jumpfast.HkX
+Added	mt_jumpfastleft.HkX
+Added	mt_jumpfastright.HkX
+Added	mt_jumpland.HkX
+Added	mt_jumplandleft.HkX
+Added	mt_jumplandright.HkX


======================================================================

I created this jump animation for myself. But I have decided that I release all my works that reached a certain quality. So I released.
author: yukl
